Here is an implementation of MESSAGE quota resource in cyrus (see RFC 2087; STORAGE resource already being handled).
Changes made in: - cyrus-imapd: the branch 'quotamessage/gnb/annotate' is available here: git://github.com/worldline-messaging/cyrus-imapd.git. It is based on Greg's 'annotate' branch on github. - cassandane: the branch 'quotamessage/gnb/master' is available here: git://github.com/worldline-messaging/cassandane.git. It is based on Greg's 'master' branch on github.
More details available in the mailing list (see archive here: http://asg.andrew.cmu.edu/archive/message.php?mailbox=archive.cyrus-devel&msg=3122).
As discussed in the mailing-list, some changes are needed in the code. Discussions on-going.

AFAIK, Julien's MESSAGE quota resource was fully merged in Oct 2011 and has been stable and working for some time. There are Cassandane tests for it which these days only break due to external factors.
